infoText: [c]Welcome Back to the lands of Middle-earth!
ยง5Major changes in mod list, one of which was a change in Roots as the mod dev rewrote it and it will render previous progress inert, so back up your maps.
New panorama for the main menu and NPC work has started.  The planned release of an alpha of the map is in about a month so keep an eye out for the announcement!
